timeline.message: [IOTDB-873] Make sure it is a prefix path

timeline.bodyHTML:
code format
}else{ -> } else {
if( !deviceAdded){ -> if (!deviceAdded) {

please use google style format: http://iotdb.apache.org/zh/Development/ContributeGuide.html
timeline.author: neuyilan

timeline.body:
Hi, we support subdevice like "root.sg.device1.subdevice1.sensor1" while subdevice1 is a measurementNode and a device. In your case, the subdevice1 will be ignored.

You can refer to the Mtree.findDevice() method.
timeline.bodyText:
